title: Blended Instructional Methodology Workshop for Designing Remote Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Customized distance education design competency enhancement program for adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can use the 4D design model (Define, Design, Develop, Disseminate) to create a blended remote learning design plan.
Learners can design a combination of asynchronous/synchronous activities applying the ANEKA concept (diversity, engagement, flexibility, etc.).
Learners can identify at least three effective interaction strategies in a mobile-based microlearning environment.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
